questions.question: What are the key components in commercial 1,3-diene polymerization catalysts?
Which lanthanides were reported to form structurally characterized homoleptic metal tetraisobutylaluminates?
What is the result of treating [Ln(AliBu4)2] with C2Cl6?
questions.answer: Formation of SmII/SmIII mixed-valence cluster [Sm6Cl8(AliBu4)6] and the YbII cluster [Yb4Cl4(AliBu4)4]

questions.question: What does the reaction with B(C6F5)3 lead to?
questions.answer: Hydride abstraction and formation of arene-coordinated hydroborates

questions.question: True or False: Binary [Yb-(AliBu4)2]/[HNPhMe2][B(C6F5)4] fabricates polyisoprene in a perfectly living manner.
What is the role of neodymium-based catalysis in synthetic rubber manufacturing?
questions.answer: Allows high performance synthetic rubber manufacturing for tires

questions.question: True or False: Lanthanide-tetraisobutylaluminato or -hydrido/isobutyl-heteroaluminato moieties are proposed as active species in isoprene polymerization.
What is the outcome of treating [Ln(AliBu4)2] with plumbocene Pb(C5Me5)2?
True or False: The divalent lanthanide complexes [Ln(AliBu4)2] are inactive in isoprene polymerization.
What does the reaction of [Ln(AliBu4)2] with tellurium(IV) chloride yield?
questions.answer: A dark, oily substance that could not be crystallized but dissolved in THF

questions.question: True or False: The SmII/SmIII mixed-valence cluster [Sm6Cl8(AliBu4)6] is active in isoprene polymerization without a cocatalyst.
What is the significance of the binary system [Yb(AliBu4)2]/[PhNMe2H][B(C6F5)4] in isoprene polymerization?
questions.answer: It exhibits ideal living polymerization behavior

questions.question: True or False: The binary system [Yb(AliBu4)2]/[PhNMe2H][B(C6F5)4] produces polyisoprene with a wide molecular weight distribution.
What is the result of treating [Ln(AliBu4)2] with 18-crown-6?
True or False: The reaction of [Ln(AliBu4)2] with B(C6F5)3 leads to the formation of a stable complex active in isoprene polymerization.
What does the reaction of [Ln(AliBu4)2] with hexachloroethane produce?
questions.answer: Blackish-green crystals of the SmII/SmIII mixed-valence cluster [Sm6Cl8(AliBu4)6] and the YbII cluster [Yb4Cl4(AliBu4)4]

questions.question: True or False: The complexes [Ln(AliBu4)2] are soluble in both aliphatic and aromatic solvents.
What is the role of the cocatalyst in the polymerization process involving [Ln(AliBu4)2]?
questions.answer: Activates [Ln(AliBu4)2], resulting in high polymer yields

questions.question: True or False: The reaction of [Ln(AliBu4)2] with B(C6F5)3 does not lead to hydride abstraction.
What is the outcome of treating [Ln(AliBu4)2] with diethyl ether?
